thread.title: Great Short weekend away in Paris
thread.title_full: Great Short weekend away in Paris - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 501mylesr
title: Great Short weekend away in Paris
text:
Had a great time as a couple weekend away in Paris, location was perfect for being central and close to a lot of tourist attractions. As soon as we arrived we had a lovely welcome and lot's of information!
Room Tip: Junior Suite was massive and had a large and spacious bed See more room tips
